summary: This document contains alerts regarding Richard Kahn, highlighting his involvement in regulatory actions and disciplinary measures by financial authorities. It details two significant events: a regulatory action by NYSE Arca for failing to provide testimony and a fine imposed by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned in connection with regulatory actions taken against him by NYSE Arca and the Florida Office of Financial Regulation for failing to provide testimony and for being fined.

persons.name: Richard Jeffrey Kahn
persons.context: Richard Jeffrey Kahn is noted for appearing on the Florida Office of Financial Regulation list of Final Orders, indicating he has faced administrative fines.

events.title: NYSE Arca Disciplinary Action
events.description: Richard Kahn was permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership for failing to provide requested testimony.

events.title: Florida Office of Financial Regulation Fine
events.description: Richard Jeffrey Kahn was fined $20,000 by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn was involved in a regulatory action by NYSE Arca for failing to provide testimony.
He was permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership unless he provided testimony within a specified timeframe.
Richard Jeffrey Kahn was fined $20,000 by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation.
The document alerts to critical risk priorities associated with Richard Kahn.
There are multiple references to Richard Kahn's disciplinary actions in financial regulatory contexts.
